title: Can we get Draft Pick on OCE please?
body:
It completely amazes me that OCE does not have draft pick yet, i remember about 2-3 years there was a brief discussion about OCE getting Draft Pick, but never went through with it.

In my opinion I guess it would some of the new players would ban a power pick going into ranked, also it would feel like that they are in a ranked game and concentrate on objectives more than kills and not worry about other peoples KDA.

People who say 'No' are Yasuo mains.

replies.body: Bring back NA Teambuilder first, then we'll talk OCE peasants.

Wait, they said retire all normal drafts? Wtf. But that's gonna make people even more furious, even if you are trying to improve queue health, it's unfair on the gamers who play this who want to experience the game to its full potential.

>[Normal Draft will be retired at the start of preseason for all regions except North America, Europe West, and Brazil. ](http://www.riftherald.com/lol-patch-notes/2016/11/9/13574822/lol-normal-draft-queue-removed-why)Our goal is to offer the fewest number of queues that give unique experiences (so we can keep queues healthy) while keeping disruption low, and in all regions except NA/EUW/BR, normal draft had very low participation. In an ideal world, we’d like to retire normal draft in all regions.

> - Riot Socrates

it looks unlikely.
